attributes.action: Products containing GMO's should be clearly labelled.
attributes.additional_details:
Any product containing GMO's should be clearly labelled so that consumers have an informed choice of what they are buying.

GMO - Genetically Modified Organism

It is widely believed that GMO's are bad for the health. Scientific studies have proven that when laboratory animals are fed products containing GMO's over a period of time, they develop serious illnesses.

I don't want to eat GMO's, but at the present time, I don't know if I am eating them or not.
